Package game

Class SuperLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.World
      • game.SuperLevel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelEditor, LevelFive, LevelFour, LevelOne, LevelSix, LevelThree, LevelTwo, Menu
    public abstract class SuperLevel
extends city.cs.engine.World
    Handles everything relating to the world (e.g. reading levels/saves from files, keeping track of enemies states, timers, etc.)

      • SuperLevel

        public SuperLevel​(STATE State,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> levels,
                  Game game,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> saves)
        Seconds constructor used when creating worlds with default levels loaded (Level 1-6).
        Parameters:
        State - The current enum STATE of the game (MENU, GAME, LEVEL_EDITOR).
        levels - An ArrayList of all the available levels in the data/Levels folder.
        game - Instance of Game.
        saves - An ArrayList of all the available saves in the data/Saves folder.
